revised_title: Asymptotic Distribution of Eigenvalues in Problems with Spherical Symmetry
tldr: The author investigates the eigenvalues of three-dimensional equations with spherical symmetry, focusing on the asymptotic distribution of these values. They use the method of separation of variables and Langer's method to approximate eigenfunctions with Bessel functions of order. The study provides insights into the behavior of eigenvalues and their applications in various fields.
